name: Reality Way
description:
REALITY WAY is a 3D adventure game where you have to repair reality fractures.

In this game, you embody a soldier who will have to cross reality in order to destroy the evil that plagues them.

All you have to do is follow the instructions you will be given to prepare for battle.

🚨 Be careful if you attack a "Damned" he will chase you. Also, if he sees you. He will attack you. 🚨

This game playable with the mouse/Keyboard and controller.

CONTROLS KEYBOARD :

⭐ - MOUSE to Move Camera

⭐ - ZQSD to Move Player

⭐ - LEFT CLICK to Attack (if you aim)

⭐ - RIGHT CLICK to aim

⭐ - F to Use/Interact

⭐ - R to Reload

CONTROLS Controller :

⭐ - RIGHT STICK to Move Camera

⭐ - LEFT STICK to Move Player

⭐ - RIGHT TRIGGER to Attack (if you aim)

⭐ - LEFT TRIGGER to aim

⭐ - X to Use

⭐ - B to Reload

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unreal Engine 4 (4.27.1)

🔧 - Audacity

🔧 - Blender

🔧 - Krita

🔧 - GIMP
